name: Amazon Dark - VisualPlastik
description:
The way Amazon was coded sucks. Their CSS doesn't cascade so its pretty time consuming to make an Amazon theme, so there aren't many. I think this one is pretty decent. Makes Amazon a nice dark gray and doesn't remove any necessary images like other userstyles.

Note: you can easily change the colors of the links and background etc just by finding the first entry in the section such as #MYCOMMENTORANGETEXT. Change #ffa658 to your preference and boom, brand new look.
additional_info:
Still an early version, will be making on going tweaks.

V6 - Couple more fixes, added .co.uk and .es sites per user suggestion.
V7 - Blacked out product image area per user suggestion.
V8 - Added more worldwide domains per user suggestion, added arial font to support opera windows
V9 - Couple more fixes for amazon's design updates
V10 - Couple more fixes for amazon's design updates
V11 - Ditto.
V12 - Minor Home Fixes.
V12 - Updates for Amazon Deals page
V13 - Few Link Color Fixes, Fixed Nav Bar white Areas
V14 - Updates for Amazon's new navigation
V15 - Significant fixes and new styling for buttons. Removed header ads. If you have roboto installed that will be the theme font. Freely available from font squirrel. Made search bar stay in place as you scroll.
V16 - Minor fixes and scrollbar themed on chrome
V17 - Fixes for amazon's new giant cart sidebar. Fixes to contact page.
V18 - Minor fixes reported by users.
V19 - Fix for amazon's new customize purchase sidebar
V20 - Fix new subnav.
V21 - Couple fixes for the discussion forums.
V22 - Couple fixes for one click order confirmation page and another unique product page. Removed a sponsored area in product page.
V23 - Product Page fix.
V24 - More minor fixes.
V25 - More minor fixes.
V26 - Amazon India
V27 - Quick Tweak for White Homepage
V28 - Tweak For Video Homepage
V29 - Shoe fitting modal
V30 - Minor Button and Modal Fix
V31 - Minor Tweaks
V32 - Tweak For AWS Homepage, Twitch Page, and Wish List
